title: The best ebikes you can buy in 2022
content:
Ebikes are awesome. They take the edge out of long cycling trips, especially if you live in a hilly city, they’re exponentially better than cars for the environment, and they’re just fun to ride. Contrary to popular belief, they’re even comparable to regular bikes for exercise. But with an ever-increasing number of options in the market, it can be hard to sift through what’s actually good and what’s junk. Fret no more, young cycling padawan: this guide offers our selections of some of our favorite ebikes to help you choose your ride. Before we get started… Because people can have…
